name: Under the Surface - LD Jam 48
description:
“Explore the station, follow the signal, uncover the secrets below.”

What starts out a a routine maintenance trip, turns into something more unsettling when a distress signal rises up from the lower levels. Will you follow the signal and travel deeper and deeper into the ocean -unravelling the Station secrets as you go,
or will you play by the rules. The choice is up to you.

(Play in full screen to avoid visual bugs!)

Our entry for Ludum Dare 48!
